mapper.select: select g.group_no, group_id, group_name, ceo_name, ceo_phone, ceo_email, reg_no as reg_num, if(c.group_no is null, 0, counts) as client_counts from `groups` g left outer join (select group_no, count(*) as counts from clients where status != '201-004' group by group_no) c on g.group_no = c.group_no order by counts desc, g.group_no desc
select count(*) from clients where status != '201-004'

select client_id, group_id, group_name, if(ci.name is null, '', ci.name) as client_name, if(ci.phone is null, '', ci.phone) as client_phone, if(ci.manager_email is null, '', ci.manager_email) as manager_email, if(ord.client_no is null, 0, orders) as orders from (select * from clients where 1 = 1 -- status != '201-004'
order by client_no desc) c join client_info ci on c.client_no = ci.client_no join `groups` g on c.group_no = g.group_no left outer join (select client_no, count(*) orders from leases group by client_no) ord on c.client_no = ord.client_no order by ord.orders desc, c.client_no desc
